hero.title: Professional Translation
hero.subtitle: and Interpretation Services
hero.description: Bridging language gaps in a globalized world is our mission. Our interpreter referral service connects you with highly skilled professionals -including native speakers - specializing in modern and rare languages, ensuring accurate and culturally sensitive communication in any setting.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We connect you with professional interpreters — many of whom are native speakers — for both common and rare languages. We ensure precise, culturally sensitive interpretation in any context.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Translation Partner
about.description: We are dedicated to providing high-quality translation and interpretation services to our clients, ensuring accurate and culturally sensitive communication in any setting. Languages include: Amharic, Baganda, Bambara, Chamba, Edo/Bini, Ewe, Fula, Ga, Hausa, Igbo, Ika, Kirundi, Krio, Kurdish (including Kurmanji & Sorani), Lingala, Luganda, Mandinka, Mongolian, Manou, Oromo, Pulaar, Arabic, Saho, Somali, Soninke, Songhai, Susu, Tigrinya, Turkish, Urdu, Wolof, Yoruba, Zarma, Zulu—and more.

euDispute.title: EU Dispute Resolution
euDispute.text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. We are not willing or obligated to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board / universal arbitration board.
